isis.stitle: TSI 93-16-12 - Remove Shipping Block From Cab Air Suspension

subjectgroup.subject: Remove Shipping Block From Cab Air Suspension

geninfo.para: 9200, 9300 and 9400 Model vehicles equipped with "Nav Air" cab air suspension are shipped with a block installed between the cab suspension track bar assembly and the cab suspension lower plate as illustrated in Figure 1. The block is held in position by the weight of the cab and a plastic stay strap. The shipping block is installed in this position to prevent the cab from moving during shipping.

Before demonstrating or delivering vehicles equipped with cab air suspension, the shipping block MUST BE REMOVED. Cut the plastic stay strap, lift up on the cab with a pry bar in an area close to the block and remove the block. Vehicles demonstrated or delivered with the block in position will not benefit from the cab air suspension.
Cab air suspension ride height for 92/93/9400 model vehicles is 7-3/4 inches. How to measure is illustrated in Figure 2.
